pos: nouns which may take the genitive case particle 'no'

lessons.japanese: 幾多の紆余曲折を経て条約は締結されるに至った。
lessons.english: The treaty has been concluded after many twists and turns.

lessons.japanese: 我々は幾多の困難を克服しなければならない。
lessons.english: We have to cope with hosts of difficulties.

lessons.japanese: 私たちの前途には幾多の困難が横たわっている。
lessons.english: There lie many difficulties before us.
